lawyers.bio: Mr. R. Sharma is the founding partner of Sharma & Associates with over 25 years of distinguished legal practice. Known for his sharp legal acumen and persuasive courtroom presence, he has successfully handled landmark cases in criminal and constitutional law. His dedication to justice and client-centric approach has earned him recognition across Tamil Nadu's legal community.

lawyers.bio: Ms. S. Kavitha brings a compassionate yet strategic approach to family law matters. With 12 years of focused experience in matrimonial disputes, child custody, and domestic relations, she is known for achieving favorable outcomes while maintaining the dignity of all parties involved. Her expertise in mediation has helped numerous families find amicable resolutions.
